name: Mysterious Stars: The Singer
synopsis: Entrusted with the God of the Stars' will, the ability to connect the stars is now yours. The God of the Stars is known to help people when they are in need, but he is getting old and would be pleased if you could help him a little. In order to deliver items that will be useful for the people down there, complete the drawing by connecting the stars. Based on the game that everyone played at least one time in their life, Connect the Dots or also called Dot-to-Dot. The God of the Stars just located a young couple who could be in need of assistance. The young man is dreaming about becoming a famous singer while his wife is doing some side-jobs to ensure some incomes. But they are very late on paying the rent and the landlady is running out of patience...
